name: part_003
file: tmp_【3DLIVE】Amazing Swing ⧸ 3D新衣装お披露目＆重大告知あり！【 #角巻わため4周年 】 [W6hZ1EYa37g]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_003.mov

scenes.description: 角巻わため and 獅白ぼたん continue their performance of 'Melancholic'.
A brief transition period with a dark screen before the next performance.
角巻わため and セレス・ファウナ perform the song 'summertime'.

subtitles.original: 明日も
subtitles.english: Tomorrow too,

subtitles.original: おんなじ
subtitles.english: will it be the same

subtitles.original: わたしが
subtitles.english: me

subtitles.original: いるのかな
subtitles.english: who is here?

subtitles.original: 無愛想で
subtitles.english: Unfriendly,

subtitles.original: 無口なままの
subtitles.english: remaining silent,

subtitles.original: カワいくないヤツ
subtitles.english: and not at all cute.

subtitles.original: あー
subtitles.english: Ah—

subtitles.original: あの夢にきみが
subtitles.english: Ever since you appeared

subtitles.original: 出てきたときから
subtitles.english: in that dream,

subtitles.original: 素直じゃないの
subtitles.english: I haven't been honest.

subtitles.original: じゃないの
subtitles.english: I haven't,

subtitles.original: だって
subtitles.english: because...

subtitles.original: 全然つかめないきみのこと
subtitles.english: I couldn't grasp a thing about you,

subtitles.original: 全然しらないうちに
subtitles.english: and before I even realized it,

subtitles.original: こころ奪おうとしてたのは
subtitles.english: the one trying to steal a heart

subtitles.original: わたしのほうだもん
subtitles.english: was actually me.

subtitles.original: ラララルラ...
subtitles.english: La la lu la...

subtitles.original: そういう時期なの
subtitles.english: It's just that kind of season,

subtitles.original: おぼれたいの
subtitles.english: I want to drown in it.

subtitles.original: いとしのメランコリー
subtitles.english: My beloved melancholy.

subtitles.original: 君の虜になってしまえばきっと
subtitles.english: If I were to become your prisoner, surely

subtitles.original: この夏は充実するの もっと
subtitles.english: this summer would be even more fulfilling.

subtitles.original: もう戻れなくたって忘れないで
subtitles.english: Even if we can't go back, please don't forget.

subtitles.original: summertime
subtitles.english: summertime

subtitles.original: 何年経っても言えない
subtitles.english: Even after all these years, I can't say it.

subtitles.original: 後悔したって構わない
subtitles.english: I don't care if I end up regretting it.

subtitles.original: でも言葉はここまで出てるの
subtitles.english: But the words are right here on my lips.

subtitles.original: ねえ サマータイム
subtitles.english: Hey, summertime.

subtitles.original: 海岸通りを歩きたい
subtitles.english: I want to walk along the coastal road.

subtitles.original: ドライブだってしてみたい
subtitles.english: I'd even like to go for a drive.

subtitles.original: ただ視線を合わせてほしいの
subtitles.english: I just want our eyes to meet.

subtitles.original: ねえ サマータイム
subtitles.english: Hey, summertime.

subtitles.original: 夜明けまで海辺走って
subtitles.english: Running by the shore until dawn,

subtitles.original: 潮騒に包まれたいね
subtitles.english: I want to be wrapped in the sound of the waves.

subtitles.original: 彼女の仕草が甘いね
subtitles.english: Her gestures are so sweet, aren't they?

subtitles.original: 君の虜になってしまえばきっと
subtitles.english: If I were to become your prisoner, surely

subtitles.original: この夏は充実するの もっと
subtitles.english: this summer would be even more fulfilling.

subtitles.original: 噂のドリーミンガール忘れないで
subtitles.english: Don't forget the rumored dreamin' girl.

subtitles.original: でも気持ちを伝えてしまえばいつか
subtitles.english: But if I were to tell you my feelings, one day

subtitles.original: この夢は覚めてしまうだろうな
subtitles.english: this dream would probably come to an end.

subtitles.original: 青い影が揺れる街角
subtitles.english: On the street corner where blue shadows sway.

subtitles.original: 占いなんて信じない
subtitles.english: I don't believe in fortune-telling.

subtitles.original: 運命なんてあるわけない
subtitles.english: There's no such thing as fate.

subtitles.original: ただ本当のことを知りたいの
subtitles.english: I just want to know the truth.

subtitles.original: ねえ サマータイム
subtitles.english: Hey, summertime.

subtitles.original: 近づく距離にも気づかない
subtitles.english: Not even noticing how close we're getting.

subtitles.original: 胸の高鳴りごまかせない
subtitles.english: I can't hide the throbbing in my chest.

subtitles.original: でも昔と変わらずニブいの
subtitles.english: But you're as dense as you've always been.

subtitles.original: ねえ サマータイム
subtitles.english: Hey, summertime.

subtitles.original: 思い出は色褪せたって
subtitles.english: Even if memories fade,

subtitles.original: 惚れた腫れたの仲がいいね
subtitles.english: it's nice to be so head-over-heels.

subtitles.original: 彼女の笑顔が憎いね
subtitles.english: Her smile is just too much, isn't it?

subtitles.original: 君の虜になってしまえばきっと
subtitles.english: If I were to become your prisoner, surely

subtitles.original: この夏は充実するの もっと
subtitles.english: this summer would be even more fulfilling.

subtitles.original: 噂のドリーミンガール忘れないで
subtitles.english: Don't forget the rumored dreamin' girl.

subtitles.original: でも気持ちを伝えてしまえばいつか
subtitles.english: But if I were to tell you my feelings, one day

subtitles.original: この夢は覚めてしまうだろうな
subtitles.english: this dream would probably come to an end.

subtitles.original: 青い影が揺れる...
subtitles.english: The blue shadows sway...

subtitles.original: 君の虜になってしまえばきっと
subtitles.english: If I were to become your prisoner, surely

subtitles.original: この夏は充実するの もっと
subtitles.english: this summer would be even more fulfilling.

subtitles.original: 噂のドリーミンガール忘れないで
subtitles.english: Don't forget the rumored dreamin' girl.
